page.title: 04FARMING..ROSSIE FARM.
page.content: {ROSSIE FARM}(GR 256125) Area 240-hectares We don't want to attempt a long comprehensive survey of farm prices but a few examples,which might prove interesting ,are given below. {LAND PRICES-}The farm was bought in 1937 for Â£10,500 _ Value in 1985-about Â£1,250,000. {CROPS }(1984 prices) Hay-Â£75 per tonne Straw-Â£25 per tonne Potatoes-Â£45 " " Grass-Rossie farm rents out grassland to other farmers for Â£200 - Â£275 per hectare. {WAGES}for a tractorman-gross pay is approx. Â£110 per week.Total including use of a cottage,milk and potatoes _Â£155 per week.
